title: Front Brake Pads - Inspection

body.body: Front Brake Pad Inspection DTC; D72; D92; DB; DB2; DC; DE; DF; DP; DP2; DPA; DT3; DT4; DU; DU3; DU4; DUY; DV; DVX; DW; DW4; DX4; DZ; DZA; DUB; DTB; DUC; DWB; DVB
Check the brake pad retainer, anti-rattle spring and retaining pin. Renew any component which shows signs of damage or corrosion.
Check the brake caliper body slides easily on the mounting bracket pins and check there is no sign of leakage from the piston seals. Rectify any problems before installing the brake pads.
